LanguageData.NY_PeacefulLife.label: our own paradise
LanguageData.NY_PeacefulLife.description: You are four close friends in a loong union settlement. Escalating tension within the settlement, and non-stopping work in the forges made you suspect the coming of war. Scars of previous wars on the society are not healed yet and you are keen not to be a part of new scars.Finally, in a stormy night, you and your friends escaped the settlement with stashed food and weapons.\n\nLoong's enemies won't spare you for being deserters, and for the same reason the loongs won't pardon you either. You're on your own, making your own little paradise amid this cruel, unforgiving world.

LanguageData.NY_ReturnOrdinary.label: lone loong deserter
LanguageData.NY_ReturnOrdinary.description: You're once one of the countless loongs, leaving home planets in the search of "emperor's command" which is said to be able to settle all conflicts. The search and the war of it, turned out to be endless. The grinder of war reduced all your comrades to dust, and so does your passion, yet no trace of the so called emperor's command is found.\n\nAnd now you're tired of it, escaping the war and the duties and the union.
